verses.verse: And I turned,<WH7725> and lifted<WH5375> up my eyes,<WH5869> and looked,<WH7200> and, behold,<WH2009> there came<WH3318> four<WH702> chariots<WH4818> out from between<WH996> two<WH8147> mountains;<WH2022> and the mountains<WH2022> were mountains<WH2022> of brass.<WH5178>
In the first<WH7223> chariot<WH4818> were red<WH122> horses;<WH5483> and in the second<WH8145> chariot<WH4818> black<WH7838> horses;<WH5483>
And in the third<WH7992> chariot<WH4818> white<WH3836> horses;<WH5483> and in the fourth<WH7243> chariot<WH4818> spotted<WH1261> and bay<WH554> horses.<WH5483>
Then I answered<WH6030> and said<WH559> to the angel<WH4397> that talked<WH1696> with me, What<WH4100> are these,<WH428> my lord?<WH113>

And the angel<WH4397> answered<WH6030> and said<WH559> to me, These<WH428> are the four<WH702> spirits<WH7307> of the heavens,<WH8064> which go<WH3318> forth<WH3318> from standing<WH3320> before<WH5921> the LORD<WH113> of all<WH3605> the earth.<WH776>

The black<WH7838> horses<WH5483> which<WH834> are therein go<WH3318> forth<WH3318> into<WH413> the north<WH6828> country;<WH776> and the white<WH3836> go<WH3318> forth<WH3318> after<WH310> them; and the spotted<WH1261> go<WH3318> forth<WH3318> toward<WH413> the south<WH8486> country.<WH776>

And the bay<WH554> went<WH3318> forth,<WH3318> and sought<WH1245> to go<WH3212> that they might walk<WH1980> to and fro through the earth:<WH776> and he said,<WH559> Get<WH3212> you hence,<WH3212> walk<WH1980> to and fro through the earth.<WH776> So they walked<WH1980> to and fro through the earth.<WH776>

Then cried<WH2199> he on me, and spoke<WH1696> to me, saying,<WH559> Behold,<WH7200> these that go<WH3318> toward<WH413> the north<WH6828> country<WH776> have quieted<WH5117> my spirit<WH7307> in the north<WH6828> country.<WH776>
And the word<WH1697> of the LORD<WH3068> came<WH1961> to me, saying,<WH559>

Take<WH3947> of them of the captivity,<WH1473> even of Heldai,<WH2469> of Tobijah,<WH2900> and of Jedaiah,<WH3048> which<WH834> are come<WH935> from Babylon,<WH894> and come<WH935> you the same<WH1931> day,<WH3117> and go<WH935> into the house<WH1004> of Josiah<WH2977> the son<WH1121> of Zephaniah;<WH6846>

Then take<WH3947> silver<WH3701> and gold,<WH2091> and make<WH6213> crowns,<WH5850> and set<WH7760> them on the head<WH7218> of Joshua<WH3091> the son<WH1121> of Josedech,<WH3087> the high<WH1419> priest;<WH3548>

And speak<WH559> to him, saying,<WH559> Thus<WH3541> speaks<WH559> the LORD<WH3068> of hosts,<WH6635> saying,<WH559> Behold<WH2009> the man<WH376> whose name<WH8034> is The BRANCH;<WH6780> and he shall grow<WH6779> up out of his place,<WH8478> and he shall build<WH1129> the temple<WH1964> of the LORD:<WH3068>

Even he shall build<WH1129> the temple<WH1964> of the LORD;<WH3068> and he shall bear<WH5375> the glory,<WH1935> and shall sit<WH3427> and rule<WH4910> on his throne;<WH3678> and he shall be a priest<WH3548> on his throne:<WH3678> and the counsel<WH6098> of peace<WH7965> shall be between<WH996> them both.<WH8147>

And the crowns<WH5850> shall be to Helem,<WH2494> and to Tobijah,<WH2900> and to Jedaiah,<WH3048> and to Hen<WH2581> the son<WH1121> of Zephaniah,<WH6846> for a memorial<WH2146> in the temple<WH1964> of the LORD.<WH3068>

And they that are far<WH7350> off shall come<WH935> and build<WH1129> in the temple<WH1964> of the LORD,<WH3068> and you shall know<WH3045> that the LORD<WH3068> of hosts<WH6635> has sent<WH7971> me to you. And this<WH2063> shall come<WH1961> to pass, if you will diligently obey<WH8085> the voice<WH6963> of the LORD<WH3068> your God.<WH430>
